body: Why `drop(stack, ...)` and `pack(stack, ...)` instead of a more conventional for C++ data structures `stack.drop(...)`, `stack.pop(...)`?
body_html: Why drop(stack, ...) and pack(stack, ...) instead of a more conventional for C++ data structures stack.drop(...), stack.pop(...)?
body_text: Why drop(stack, ...) and pack(stack, ...) instead of a more conventional for C++ data structures stack.drop(...), stack.pop(...)?
